<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="3.5">3.5<a class="anchor-link" href="#3.5"> </a></h1><p>NOT: if true, return false (and vice versa)</p>
<p>OR: if either boolean is true, return true; else return false</p>
<p>AND: if both booleans are true, return true; else return false</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">activities</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s2">&quot;tennis&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s2">&quot;football&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># NOT</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_not_playing</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sport</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">activities</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">sport</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># OR</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_playing_sport</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">activities</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;tennis&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="n">activities</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;football&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># AND</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">has_no_time_for_homework</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">activities</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;tennis&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">activities</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&quot;football&quot;</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># MAIN LOGIC</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">is_not_playing</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;football&quot;</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;you should play football!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">is_playing_sport</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;great job, sports are good!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">has_no_time_for_homework</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;wow, you&#39;re busy!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>you should play football!
great job, spots are good!
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="3.6">3.6<a class="anchor-link" href="#3.6"> </a></h1><p>Selection: only run some lines of code if a certain condition is true. One example of this is an <code>if-then</code> statement.
Algorithm: a procedure of code that does something or a task. One example is a Python function that adds a certain constant to the integer provided as input and returns the new number.
Conditional statement: statement that affects whether a chunk of code will be executed or not. One example is an <code>if-then</code> statement.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">lights</span>
<span class="n">lights</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mb">0b00000000</span>

<span class="c1"># light: light number from the left</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">light_place</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">pow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">print_lights</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="si">{:08b}</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lights</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">light_toggle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">lights</span>
    <span class="c1"># xor flips</span>
    <span class="n">lights</span> <span class="o">^=</span> <span class="n">light_place</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">light_on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">lights</span>
    <span class="c1"># or always turns on</span>
    <span class="n">lights</span> <span class="o">|=</span> <span class="n">light_place</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">light_off</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">lights</span>
    <span class="c1"># anding with mask (uses not) turns off</span>
    <span class="n">lights</span> <span class="o">&amp;=</span> <span class="o">~</span><span class="n">light_place</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">## conditionals ##</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_light_on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">lights</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">lights</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">light_place</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">lights</span>


<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">is_light_off</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">global</span> <span class="n">lights</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">is_light_on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">light</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">print_lights</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">light_toggle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">print_lights</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">light_on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">print_lights</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">light_off</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">print_lights</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">is_light_on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">is_light_on</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>00000000
01000000
01000010
00000010
True
False
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="3.7">3.7<a class="anchor-link" href="#3.7"> </a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">forehand</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">90</span>
<span class="n">backhand</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">50</span>
<span class="n">serve</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">75</span>
<span class="n">name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;what&#39;s ur name? &quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">makes_team</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">forehand</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">70</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">backhand</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">80</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">serve</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">85</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">makes_team</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">makes_team</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">backhand</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">85</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">makes_team</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">serve</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">70</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">makes_team</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">makes_team</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;congrats&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;you made it!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;that&#39;s tough&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;you didn&#39;t make it!&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>that&#39;s tough safin you didn&#39;t make it!
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>

<span class="n">teacher</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Mortensen&quot;</span>
<span class="n">code_quality</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">90</span>

<span class="n">give_up</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">teacher</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Mortensen&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">give_up</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">motivation</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">give_up</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">code_quality</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="mi">80</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">give_up</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">give_up</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;give up it&#39;s not worth it&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">number</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">guess</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;guess my number! &quot;</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">guess</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">number</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;too low&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">guess</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">number</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;just right&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;wayy too big&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">phone</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;iphone&quot;</span>
<span class="n">laptop</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;macbook&quot;</span>
<span class="n">headphones</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;airpods&quot;</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">phone</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;iphone&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;nice iphone&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">laptop</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;macbook&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;nice macbook&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">headphones</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;airpods&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;nice airpods&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;you have 3 apple devices&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;you only have 2 apple devices&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">headphones</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;airpods&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;nice airpods&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;you have 2 apple devices&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;you only have 1 apple device&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;you should get an iphone&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">
